H0.text: Coal is a primary energy source used by power plants to generate electricity.

H1.text: Wood is a primary energy source used by power plants to generate electricity.

H2.text: Gasoline is a primary energy source used by power plants to generate electricity.

H3.text: Batteries are a primary energy source used by power plants to generate electricity.

A4.text: Coal burnt in coal power stations to generate electricity is called thermal coal.

A5.text: In 2022, 68% of global coal use was used for electricity generation.
